select spring_order_seq.nextval from dual
insert into spring_orders (order_no, order_username, order_tel) values (#{no},#{username}, #{tel})
insert into spring_order_items (item_no, order_no, product_no, item_price, item_amount) values (spring_order_seq.nextval,#{orderNo},#{productNo},#{price},#{amount})
insert into spring_order_payments (pay_no, pay_type, pay_account, order_no) values (spring_order_seq.nextval,#{type},#{account},#{orderNo})

insert into spring_order_delivery (delivery_no, delivery_username, delivery_tel, delivery_address, delivery_status, order_no) values (spring_order_seq.nextval,#{username},#{tel},#{address},#{status},#{orderNo})
